text: Lee Seon-seong (born 26 December 1980) is a South Korean gymnast. He competed in six events at the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of South Korea Category:Gymnasts at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in gymnastics Category:Gymnasts at the 2002 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for South Korea Category:Medalists at the 2002 Asian Games
title: Lee Seon-seong
